title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {theblock: The Block TV Data},   author = {Michael Lydeamore},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {http://www.michaellydeamore.com/theblock/}, }

title: The Block TV Data
text: theblock provides data Weekly room wins, team judge, auction results Seasons 5 19 Australian Reality TV Series “Block”.

title: The Block TV Data
text: can install development version theblock GitHub :

title: The Block TV Data
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(theblock)  # Data on weekly room wins head(room_results) #>   week       area   judge      couple score season #> 1    1 Front Room Shaynna dale_sophie     6      5 #> 2    1 Front Room Shaynna mike_andrew     5      5 #> 3    1 Front Room Shaynna   brad_lara     5      5 #> 4    1 Front Room Shaynna    dan_dani     5      5 #> 5    1 Front Room    John dale_sophie     5      5 #> 6    1 Front Room    John mike_andrew     5      5  # And on auction results head(auction_results) #>   rank      couple reserve auction_result profit total_winnings auction_order #> 1    1   brad_lara 1114000        1620000 506000         606000             1 #> 2    2    dan_dani  992000        1440000 448000         448000             2 #> 3    3 mike_andrew  966000        1400001 434001         434001             4 #> 4    4 dale_sophie  975000        1330000 355000         355000             3 #> 5    1  phil_amity 1375000        1670000 295000         395000             4 #> 6    2  josh_jenna 1375000        1650000 275000         275000             1 #>   season bought_by amount_sold_for_after_auction total_profit #> 1      5      <NA>                            NA           NA #> 2      5      <NA>                            NA           NA #> 3      5      <NA>                            NA           NA #> 4      5      <NA>                            NA           NA #> 5      6      <NA>                            NA           NA #> 6      6      <NA>                            NA           NA

what: Auction Results from The Block — auction_results
title: Auction Results from The Block — auction_results
Auction Results from The Block — auction_results
Auction Results from The Block — auction_results
text: tibble containing 71 rows 11 columns: rank Auction Rank. 1 indicates winning auction couple Couple name, separated underscore reserve Reserve price property auction_result Sell price property profit Amount taken home team. Includes penalties total_winnings Total winnings - includes prize money auction_order Order auction. 1 first season Show season bought_by notably buyers names included. NA amount_sold_for_after_auction properties sold auction, price put total_profit Total amount taken home, includes deductions prize money. often NA Wikipedia store seasons.

what: Room Results from The Block — room_results
title: Room Results from The Block — room_results
text: Contains individual room results Seasons 5 19 Block

title: Room Results from The Block — room_results
Room Results from The Block — room_results
text: tibble containing 3236 rows 6 columns: week Week show area Description room type judge judge gave score. Includes "Total" judge. Note total scores may sum individual judge scores, due penalties bonus points. couple Couple name, separated underscore score Score room, 10 (except Total) season Show season
